lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Toshiba reduced the number of divisions to three from four in reaction to market changes, effective April 1.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Group sales of telecommunication and electronic devices, accounting for 36 pct of the total, rose five pct to 1,183 billion yen in 1987/88 from a year earlier, helped by good sales of word processors, workstations, medical equipment, point-of-sales systems and exports of personal computers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Home appliance sales abroad fell 24 pct to 312.10 billion, mainly due to the yen's appreciation, lower sales to China, and increased competition with newly-industrialised countries.

lst.name: sentence
